name: New Top Cycling Track Master
description:
Cycle racing is one of the earliest form of road racing and have most numbers of competitors. Get ready to take another journey and enjoy an amazing bicycle ride around the beautiful city. Ride on cycle navigates through beautiful city roads; and fast paddle not for only fitness, for win cycle race against professionals. This game gives you bicycle training driving. You have not played such type of bicycle rider games as yet. So resuscitate the exclusivity in bicycle rider racing simulator games with your bicycle combined with the person. It's your time to display some audacity and responsibility required to riding these amazing bicycles. This extremely convincing bicycle rider game is packed with different kinds of levels.
Maintain your freestyle bicycle speed and ride on city roads as a best bicycle rider performing extreme riding adventure. Avoid hitting and epic clashes else it will end up the level. Flip your bicycle left and right to change your direction. Master your bicycle skills in City Rider and become the perfect bicycle rider of big city in an amazing action simulator. The environment of this endless game is very realistic and amazing. Are you ready to survive the challenges of this driver adventure? If answer is yes then be ready to face the challenges of this realistic cycle racing game.
Features:
1. Realistic and steady controls
2. Smooth racing tracks
3. Breath taking & Stunning city environment
4. Beautiful and awesome game graphics
5. Real and nice sound effects
